I love an upscale Dominican sports bar and lounge. The baseball game on while I eat dinner the music is at the correct volume and its all Dominican music. The food I had was great I haven't been here in years and it was better than I remember. I had skirt steak, goat stew, chicken croquets, a chimi sandwich, fried chicken and the alfredo pasta. All of it was outstanding. I love to see an old establishment still pumping out classic meals. Definitely love this place.
The service is satisfying.

Totally hands down one of the best Dominican restaurants I‚Äôve been to I love the baseball themed atmosphere now lets talk about the food simply delicious every thing was amazing straight Situation

Food was good, but the service needs work. We got there around 6 PM for happy hour, and it took 30 minutes just to get our drinks ‚Äî and they were way too strong.  ( order mango margarita and got a different flavor ) in addition to We also ordered tres leches, but the waitress brought a different dessert and told us, ‚ÄúThis one is fresh,‚Äù without asking if we were okay with the change.

Not a terrible experience, but not in a rush to go back.
Me gustan los tragos excelente,A mi ni√±a le encant√≥ la cena..un ambiente √∫nico y especial.el Dj me encant√≥ su nombre es DjBoryBudda.

Very nice restaurant with lively music, although they have a more quiet side for those wanting a calm dinner. The venezia is a good dish. Cordon blue was okay, but could use some more flavor. Dolce de leche was nice but could've been a bit bigger for the price. I'd go back but try something different.

I have been here a few times and let me say that it is a great restaurant. The food and ambience are great. They have a lounge area where hookah is allowed and they also have a kid friendly section. The servers are super friendly and attentive, especially Laura. She made our whole experience top tier!
Definitely recommend stopping by Cafe Rubio.

One of the best gourmet sports bar restaurant in Queens. Tasty food, nice atmosphere, big tv screens. Service staff personnel very attentive to details. The bar offers a variety of üç∏üç∫ and very friendly and attentive barmaids; specially Giselle.ü´°

Mi experiencia en este restaurante fue en su mayor√≠a positiva, con excepci√≥n de un incidente desafortunado con el pedido de las bebidas. A pesar de haber solicitado una pi√±a colada virgen para los ni√±os, la mesera la trajo con alcohol, lo que pudo haber sido peligroso ya que los ni√±os ya hab√≠an consumido parte de la bebida. Ella noto el error y corrio a mesa pero ya los ninos habian tomado parde tragos ü•¥ A pesar de este inconveniente, decidimos no causar un esc√°ndalo y lo dejamos pasar.

En cuanto al resto de la experiencia, la comida estuvo deliciosa y el servicio fue amable y atento. Sin embargo, es crucial que el restaurante mejore sus procesos para garantizar que los pedidos de bebidas se sirvan correctamente, especialmente cuando se trata de servir alcohol a menores de edad.

En general, recomendar√≠a este restaurante, pero sugiero tener cuidado al hacer pedidos de bebidas para evitar situaciones inc√≥modas como la que experimentamos. ¬°Espero que tomen medidas para mejorar este aspecto y brindar una experiencia a√∫n mejor a sus clientes en el futuro!

Almost 5 stars, but the food (main courses) were barely warm, almost room temperature.

Diana was my waitress, she was very attentive. Always checking up on the table and made sure everything was in order. The service is great and the food even better!! I will be coming in many more times.

Came in for drinks with friends, the place looked good and clean.

Has a full bar with great drinks and friendly staff. It  was the perfect spot to hang out. Music wasn‚Äôt too loud or too low, it was perfect.

Food was ok I guess tasted good, you just can‚Äôt see what are you eating since everything is covered with sauce and cheese. Also was a bit over priced, like if you was paying for fancy rice and beans.

Over all it‚Äôs a great chill spot. Try it.

I will have to say this place surprised me.
At first glance from outside you really don't expect much but hoping that the food is good, but once you enter you see that this place is really nice it actually also has an outside area in the back which i would love to see the set up in the summer to come.
Right from the entrance is a bar that looks like it can accommodate anybody's drinking desire which is most definitely good haha.
More inside it has alot more seats and tables with better lighting. Which looks looks like it can be a dance floor at night time.
So overall in the looks department i would say spot on. The staff was very friendly and did their job well
Now food wise it was a little on the high end in price but the most important thing is the food and it was really good and up to my expectations I would personally come back again to try more dishes from the Dominican Republic.
Victoria was an amazing server! She was attentive, knowledgeable, and most of all kind. The ambiance and food was also great. Will be coming back and requesting Maria as my server.

Luego de un par de a√±os, pas√© a visitar Caf√© Rubio, como siempre, las mejores atenciones en un ambiente agradable y familiar y sobre todo deliciosa comida ! Afuera encontr√© un auto de colecci√≥n que me pareci√≥ muy atractivo, para dar una vuelta por NY en buena compa√±√≠a. üòÉ

Just was walking through the area looking for a place to watch some football, so glad I stumbled upon this place, the food was amazing and drinks very good, all of the staff I came in contact with were exceptionally nice and friendly. I don‚Äôt speak Spanish so it was a little difficult ordering but still totally worth it. The interior is very clean and modern and the bathrooms are above excellent compared to most restaurants. It doesn‚Äôt look like much from the outside and after walking around the area I didn‚Äôt expect a place like this to be here, definitely don‚Äôt pass it up if you have a chance.

El lugar es muy lindo, aunque ellos tengan su p√∫blico, si ellos se dedicar√°n as√≠ como le dan publicidad a los juegos de pelotas le dieran publicidad al lugar fuera un √©xito. M√°s personas tendr√≠an porque en ese Instagram de ellos solo es anuncios de pelotas que colocan. Si era por eso yo no iba a ir nunca porque no ve√≠a nada atractivo, yo fui porque una amiga siempre va y me dice que le gusta, y el lugar est√° bell√≠simo. La comida es econ√≥mica y buena.

We've been coming here for years - can't believe it's taken this long to write a review. But Rubios is seriously the best - the breakfast here is our JAM. You can't go wrong with anything on their menu, but some of my favorites are the Rubios breakfast burrito (so filling), breakfast plate (eggs, plantains, and beans), and breakfast sandwich (with yummy bacon). I'm usually in the mood to have my eggs cooked a different way every time I come here, and they are a champion in terms of getting my order right each time.
Love the family - seriously, you can taste the love in their food. It's what keeps us coming back. Also, huge shout out on their lunch and dessert offerings. We don't come for lunch that often (usually because we're here for brunch and fill up on breakfast food), but their chicken and carne asade dishes are crazy good. And when I'm really feeling like I need to indulge, I get a slice of their chocolate cake or fruit tarte to go. Makes my entire weekend.
They are OPEN during this pandemic for take-out and delivery so do yourself a favor and get some Rubios.

Visitamos Caf√© Rubio y tuvimos una experiencia excelente. La atenci√≥n fue de primera, especialmente gracias a Luisa, nuestra mesera, quien nos atendi√≥ con mucha amabilidad y profesionalismo. Estuvo siempre atenta a los detalles y nos hizo sentir muy bienvenidos. ¬°Definitivamente volveremos!
I‚Äôve been there a few times and the service was great every time. The waitress Laura was very attentive and polite. I‚Äôd definitely like to go when she‚Äôs on duty.

Super experiencia el servicio de primer nivel todo el personal super amable, muy atento y  con toda la disposici√≥n para atendernos, la comida estuvo excelente, estuvimos un grupo de 20 personas y probamos variedad de platos empezando con el mejor aperitivo que me he comido la estrella del amor que tiene salsa blanca deliciosa  y el crab cake, tambi√©n como plato fuerte pudimos compartir el Tomahawk acompa√±ado de un excelente Vino, pl√°tanos a la playa, Jarabacoa ensue√±o que trae una salsa de cangrejo exquisita, y el salm√≥n rubio que tiene una salsa blanca espectacular , tienen variedad de c√≥cteles y buena selecci√≥n de vinos tambi√©n, todos los comensales quedamos muy satisfechos, el ambiente incre√≠ble, el patio muy agradable y acogedor con buena m√∫sica, me encanto este lugar s√∫per recomendado para compartir en familia o con amigos. 200 de 100

I had such a great experience thanks to
Our waitress  Laura,, she was friendly, helpful with the menu and always had a smile. excellent service definitely recommend!

I visited this restaurant on a Monday at around 1pm for the first time ever and was unfortunately let down by the service. Despite high expectations, the experience fell short due to the inattentive waitress, there was only two tables by the way, i would understand if it was packed but it wasn‚Äôt the restaurant was empty. We initially get there and are seated, then we‚Äôre asked if we want a menu we kindly said yes. Which i thought that was automatically done when dinning in a restaurant. Then she brings one menu, mind you it was a party of two. We asked for the check thankfully the person i was with looked at the check to find that it was the wrong check for the larger party that was there. Best part is gratuity is included there‚Äôs no option out of it regardless if the service was subpar or amazing. I hope the management addresses these issues, from the reviews it seems as if we weren‚Äôt alone with this terrible experience. Also skip the mofongo.

Love this place anytime - dinner, hookah, DJ, live music, dancing - doesn‚Äôt matter!
Seafood plate ‚ÄúPl√°tano a la Playa‚Äù was out of this world!
